channel.title: Golden-One-Center - Tag - Sacramento Massage Therapist | Paul Brown

item.title: New Location
item.author: paul@paulbrown.net (Paul Brown)
item.description:
I am so pleased to announce that Paul Brown Massage Therapy Pain Relief Center has moved back to its original Sacramento location in the beautiful and historic Ochsner Building at 717 K Street, directly across the street from the east entrance to the Golden One Center!

Iâ€™m on the pedestrian block of K Street, between 7th and 8th Streets, and there is plenty of metered street parking, as well as four garages within one block of my location!
